>
[In Plain Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3810) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 127

**Archetype** [Alter Ego](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=187)

**Prerequisites**
[Alter Ego Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3807)

</column>

---

People often only see what they want to see, a weakness you know how to take full advantage of. While you've Assumed a Role, you can use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) in place of [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) when using the [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=511) exploration activity in an area where someone with your role wouldn't be unusual, such as when impersonating a sailor or fisher when infiltrating the docks.
